sets.tps: 200 HP, 52 En, 200 M Def, 48 R Def / 36 En, 64 R Def
sets.detail:
200 HP and 200 Melee Defense are to be as Melee bulky as possible 
 52 Energy = 253 Energy at level 50 for (2 Body Crashes + 1 Ice Hammer + 2 Bulk Ups + 1 Rejuvenate) (use if not Heavy Armor) 
 36 Energy = 250 Energy at level 50 for (3 Body Crashes + 1 Bulk Up + 1 Rejuvenate) (use if Heavy Armor) 
 48 / 64 Ranged Defense is leftovers and improves overall bulk
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
